Ask HN: Can/should I make an online shop with handwritten HTML&CSS?
text:
I'm a cs student who have been selling a very specific and niche bicycle part. I have already sell quite a few locally using facebook marketplace. I recently tried Amazon and sold a few but was shocked by the 15% cut.

I'm wondering if I can/should make an online shop using vanilla html and css with PayPal/Stripe API payment buttons. I only have 3 product models and don't need shopping carts as most people would just buy one item. Shipping fee will also be fixed. No need for SEO or analytics. I have made a few websites before and enjoy making simple lightweight ultra-fast websites, so time spent on developing the website wouldn't be a cost to me.

Any security / legal / business aspects that I should consider?

title: Ask HN: HN equivalent for healthcare-related topics?
text: I dabble in both words (healthcare and tech) and would very much enjoy a platform with the same level of intelligent discourse as HN but focusing on healthcare news rather than tech. Is there anything similar?

title: Ask HN: Spam Filter for Office 365
text: We use the Cloud-base Office 365 Outlook mail server and looking for a better spam protection than the built-in one. We don't want a self hosted solution and it should integrate with Office 365 out of the box. We have heard of N-able Mail Assure but there are a lot of bad reviews out there. Has anyone heard of a better alternative?
